18th June

Blog Restarts

So, I have planned to restart the blog again today. It would be a lot different than the previous one, I would say "boring" and staright forward without any puns or interesting/forced up gossips of the day. So basically today is sort of milestone for me or maybe I am just exaggerating but I really feel that way. I finally got the invite letter from the a very super cool professor, I havent even read the whole doc he gave me for the starters but the glimpse is that he is making something really cool which is also classified so I cant share it even if my blog has 0 audience. But I really wanted to work with such a project with a great vision. I need to sort out a few things before start working on the new project because I want to focus completely over it. I have to automate the work of my other projects i guess I am basically thinking of making sort of a task scheduler so that a predefined and apt message is automatically sent to the team of a certain project. lets see what I finally come up with. Cheers
